dc_title_s: Appalachian National Scenic Trail - Shelter Locations: Pennsylvania
dc_description_s: This data set represents the most current depiction of the Appalachian National Scenic Trail Shelter locations. Locational information used to create this data set were obtained from both Global Positioning Systems (GPS) survey data collected between 1998-2001 and information digitized from USGS topographical maps and Appalachian Trail maps.
dc_creator_sm: Appalachian Trail Conference and National Park Service Appalachian Trail Park Office
